# PLAYER::SET_PLAYER_SIMULATE_AIMING

## Summary
Simulate player aiming input. Disabled on input detection

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** simulateAiming

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Enable/disable player simulating aiming.
